title: FAA Orders Immediate Inspections After United Engine Failure
sub_head: U.S. air-safety regulators said move affects only United Airlines, and follows grounding of certain Boeing 777 models by Japanese counterparts
body:
Breaking News:
Boeing Recommends Suspending 128 777s Jets Powered By Pratt & Whitney Engines
Boeing Backs Suspension of Flying Certain 777 Jets By U.S., Japan
Boeing Move Follows Engine Breaking Apart During United Airlines Flight Saturday
(Article Below Will Update)
